author: Source: Echo-news.co.uk
title: David Beckham still wary of drinking alcohol in front of Sir Alex... - Echo-news.co.uk
text:
The former United manager is returning to the Old Trafford dugout next month to manage Beckham and a host of other stars in a charity match. On his former manager's involvement in the match, Beckham told BBC Radio 1: "I called him and asked him.
 Echo-news.co.uk.
